```{r setup}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(tigris)
library(sf)
```

```{r}
denver <- read_csv("../data/homicide-data.csv") %>% 
  filter(city == "Denver") %>% 
  unite(coordinates, lat, lon, sep = ",") %>% 
  select(coordinates, disposition, victim_race)

denver_race <- denver %>% 
  group_by(victim_race) %>% 
  mutate(count = n()) %>% 
  arrange(desc(count)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  filter(victim_race == c("Black", "White", "Hispanic"))
denver_race

denver_zip <- zctas(cb = TRUE, starts_with = c("800", "801", "802", "803", "806"))
plot(denver_zip)

```
